page.title: 20Town and Mountain Memories.
page.content: Every Sunday was a special day - no work - the chapels were full. Monday was always washing day....home from school and clean and put away Sunday's boots till next week! Everyone gathered together to do the hay-making,sheep dipping,threshing.Everyone went to Pwnc and we had to know our Bible to answer.The Singing Festival was held in different places each year and we would miss school for that. There was a Squire's tea-party and sports at Llwyngwair Manor,we also had one such party in the sand-dunes at Traeth Mawr. Short trousers,sunburned,scabbed knees(the roads were rough!)At school Sandwiches and cold tea from a bottle. Two ffairs,a circus,regetta every year. Ring worm,scarlet fever,whooping cough etc. - more children died then.
